Name: QualityStatementName
Description: Name of the QualityStatement using the DDI Name structure.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the QualityStatement. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the QualityStatement. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: Standard
Description: Identifies the external standard used and describes the level of compliance with the standard in terms specific aspects of the standard's content.

Name: OtherQualityStatement
Description: Describes the steps taken to ensure quality that are not related to a specific standard. Language variants should be captured within a single OtherQualityStatement. Repeat the OtherQualityStatement for differing content if needed.
